Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY
PRIOR OFFERS ARE INVITED!
Make your first or retirement home a good one! Like this! Positioned in a friendly neighbourhood thats really handy to amenities, this lovely three bedroom home presents exceptionally well.
The 490m2 (approx.) block offers a garden that can be enjoyed by green thumbs, young children and by adults who enjoy outdoor entertaining on the deck.
Inside features robes in all the bedrooms, a lounge room, immaculate kitchen and bathroom facilities, a meals zone that flows out to the deck and the comforts of ducted heating and split system cooling.
Theres also a double garage, a 2000 litre water tank, large garden shed and a paved courtyard to complete this convincing property.

Description:
* UNDER CONTRACT *
Set in a peaceful court location on 413m2 (approx) only a stones throw from McAdams Square specialty stores and supermarket and a range of quality schools including Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Sheppard Primary, Croydon Hills Primary and Luther College, this tastefully renovated modern home offers a lifestyle of comfort and convenience.
Easy living is assured for you and your family in this delightful single level home packed with contemporary features from the modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, glass splash backs, breakfast bar and granite bench tops, to the 3 bedrooms with built in robes, main bedroom and ensuite with double shower plus a study/4th bedroom.
Further highlights include a sleek family bathroom with separate toilet, large laundry with generous linen storage, gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum, polished floorboards and split system air conditioning in the main living area.
Relax and unwind effortlessly outdoors too with covered alfresco entertaining and low maintenance gardens.
A unique and rare find perfect for a young family or downsizers in this sort after area. Move quick and call to arrange an inspection today!

Description:
Large Family Oasis In Prized Court Location
Fresh, modern and comfortable are three words that come to mind when you step through the front door of this fabulous double storey home, located in a quiet, family friendly court close to schools, shops and public transport.
Quality carpet and a warm colour scheme work well together to create a relaxing ambience in the main lounge room and adjoining dining, flowing through to a spacious casual living zone incorporating a family area, meals and well equipped timber kitchen featuring an electric oven, new gas stove, stainless steel dishwasher, new stone bench top, as well as ample cupboards and bench space.
The home places a major emphasis on lifestyle, offering a semi-enclosed entertaining area in addition to a second covered deck, furthermore, the lower level also comprises a study with built-in robe (optional fifth bedroom) conveniently close to a light filled bathroom with shower and toilet.
The well executed floor plan conveniently contains four robed, double sized bedrooms upstairs; a master comprising a balcony, walk-in robe, full ensuite with corner spa, separate shower and stylish timber vanity. The family bathroom and study nook only proves this fabulous home has been designed with every detail well planned and carried out.
A host of extras include; gas ducted heating, ample cupboards, stair storage, awnings, shed, remote double garage with internal access, abundant parking and secure backyard for kids and pets.
Perched on a sizable 650m2 (approx) block, the well tendered gardens add a superb finish and surrounded by other beautiful homes, the location couldn't be more convenient, within walking distance to the bus stop, kindergarten, Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College, McAdam Square Shopping Centre, tranquil walking tracks and much more.
So much room and style to match, this beautiful home is open for admiration.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
Designed with Effortless Living in Mind
This brand new townhouse is perfect for Professionals, First Homebuyers, Downsizers or Investors. Discover a practical open plan design featuring high ceilings and an ultra-modern gourmet kitchen showcasing quality s/s appliances and an
elegant lounge room fuses through to a sun-filled family/meals room with garden access; for seamless indoor/outdoor living and entertaining. Three bedrooms (fitted BIRs) are serviced by a central bathroom with spa bath and master bedroom with a walk in robe and ensuite. The laundry has excellent built-in storage and outdoors you will find a low maintenance entertaining area. Quality appointments: ducted heating, evaporative cooling and secure remote double garage. When you consider how close it is to transport, local shops, Hochkins Ridge and Griff Hunt Reserves you'll know this is a superb find. Act now to make it yours.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Idyllic Family Lifestyle in a Natural Setting
The leafy untouched surrounds of this charming home provide an impressive introduction. But what's really impressive are the 3 living areas; perfectly suited to families who enjoy flexibility and space. Abundant in natural light, the entry to the home showcases the formal lounge and dining domain enriched with polished floorboards. Toward the back you'll discover a spacious family room adjoining the master bedroom and kitchen while a rumpus room which is positioned perfectly along side the other three robed bedrooms and family bathroom, accommodates the needs of young children or teens. Outdoors, 2 separate entertainment zones are complemented by established gardens that beautifully fill the sprawling 1756SQM(approx) block.
Also features:
*Main bed with ensuite & walk-through robe
*BIRs (beds 2-4); GDH & evaporative cooling
*Sub-floor storage; Shed; Water tanks
*Remote double garage & ample off-street parking
*Easy access to bus services & McAdam SQ shops
*Walk to Luther College & The Good Shepherd Primary

Description:
*UNDER CONTRACT*
Gracing a picturesque outlook, this magnificent home on a huge 2098m2 (approx.) block takes full advantage of the Northerly light where views to Mount Beauty can be admired on a clear day.
Completely refurbished inside, most of the rooms enjoy a sunlit ambiance all day with an easy connection made from the spacious indoor living areas to the outdoors.
Everything here is right on trend and will provide a beautiful place to call home for the family. The luxurious kitchen is made up of Granite bench tops, glass splash backs and quality appliances, whilst the bathrooms have a timeless focus that will appeal to most.
Whilst the kitchen is the heart of the home, its also the room that divides the three bedrooms, family room and main bathroom from the other end of the home where you can enjoy your own sanctuary, including a huge spa en suite as well as the cosy lounge room that's staged with an open fire place.
An impressive list of appointments include ducted heating, four wall air conditioners, high ceilings, feature slate flooring, a single garage and a double carport. The rest is made up of an exquisite landscape and a beautiful selection of plantations that create a visually appealing garden. There is plenty of off-street parking available, easy access to the local schools and to Eastlink, and the tranquil surrounds make this a home that you not could not only live in but also enjoy.
Prior Offers Invited.

Other location highlights include:
*Positioned to take full advantage of superb views

Description:
A Family Delight
This wonderful brick veneer home is a complete family delight as you will discover when stepping inside to experience the immaculate interiors with a great family feel and design.
Perfectly positioned on almost a 1/4 acre block the home offers you 4 good sized bedrooms, the main at the rear of the home has full view of the back garden and a large spa ensuite plus triple built in robes.
The living areas flow beautifully from the formal entry starting with the lounge room at the front, then through the meals area adjacent to the kitchen which over looks the open plan family room at the rear.
The centrally located kitchen is the real hub of the home and is well equipped with quality appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar plus loads of bench and cupboard space to ensure the chef of the family can make their kitchen rule at any meal time.
Before we experience what outside has to offer we mustn't forget other internal features such as gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, main bathroom, 2 toilets, quality parquetry flooring, carpeted bedrooms, ducted vacuum, plenty of natural light with soft colours and tones.
Moving out from the family room you'll find a spacious balcony that will be the ideal spot for family gatherings, casual BBQ's, a cool afternoon drink or a leisurely weekend breakfast with a coffee and the paper.
The flat backyard has great space making it the perfect venue for a game of backyard cricket, kicking the footy, playing fetch with the dog or simply making it an established garden oasis with plants, flowers and a veggie patch.
The handy person of the family with love the 4 car garage with a heap of room to set up a workshop area at the back whilst still having plenty of room for the family cars.
All this is close to shopping centres, transport, respected schools, parkland's and walking tracks.
The delight for the family will start by being quick and booking your viewing today.
Investors take note, with a potential rental return of $420-$440 per week, this property offers an excellent opportunity!

Description:
Individuality Shines
The design of this family home is pleasing to the eye with views over the pampered garden and a far reaching panoramic vista towards Christmas Hills. The mezzanine outlook creates a fluidity and unique feel to this home surrounded by a colourful garden where roses bloom in abundance. Featuring double doors opening into the tiled bright entry, study, OFP and Cathedral ceilings adorn the lounge room, spacious dining room, well equipped kitchen-meals-family zone where the family gathers to relax and catch up. Upstairs there are 3 robed bedrooms including the main bedroom/WIR/lovely spa ensuite plus private balcony overlooking the neighbourhood plus a family bathroom. Inclusions: GDH, evaporative ducted cooling, monitored security system, solar panels, powder room, auto garaging with the convenience of internal access. Relaxed alfresco entertaining is a certainty, enjoy a BBQ (with mains connection), alternatively sit on the veranda and unwind! Positioned in a quality Court, on an elevated block on the high side. Near Croydon Hills and Yarra Road primary schools, short commute to Luther College, Good Shepherd and Yarra Valley Grammar along with McAdam Square. Eastland, North Ringwood shops and Eastlink are all conveniently placed.

Description:
Expressions of Interest Closing Tuesday 11 March at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
The perfect fusion of indoors and out
Imagine a lifestyle with resort appeal, the kind of home where you always feel like you're on holidays!
Enjoying a court location in the esteemed Birts Hill precinct, this 9 year-old, owner-built executive home has a Mediterranean influence, comprising 4-5 large bedrooms, 3 living zones and a spectacular internal courtyard with a fireplace. Perhaps you're downsizing from acreage, but still crave space and storage.
Open spaces and natural sunlight are highlighted in the kitchen and dining zone, enhanced by multi-stacker doors revealing the courtyard. With a walk-in pantry, the sky-lit timber kitchen features a dishwasher, wall oven, gas cooktop and Rinnai temperature-controlled hot water.
A carpeted, sunken lounge has 11' ceilings, while the rumpus room with a wet bar also accesses the spectacular courtyard.
4 carpeted bedrooms with built-in robes and a study/5th bedroom share 2 contemporary bathrooms, including the master bedroom with a walk-in wardrobe and spacious ensuite.
The triple, drive-through garage/workshop has full-height remote doors and ample sealed driveway space for boat/trailer/caravan parking. Further inclusions: gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, powder room, surround sound wiring, high ceilings, ducted vacuum and drying cupboard.
Amongst a cul-de-sac, enjoy private and prestigious living in an area preserved by a design and development overlay in order to maintain the area's serene beauty and long-term appeal. Walk to Birts Hill and Warrien Reserves, with a selection of nearby schools, shops and transport.
- Private semi-enclosed courtyard
- Ample garaging and parking
- Central heating and cooling
- 3 living areas
- Generous light-filled spaces
Terms 10% deposit, balance 60/90/120 days
Land: 864 sq m approx.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Perfectly positioned to the rear of an attractive complex of just 6, this fabulous contemporary home comes with peace and privacy assured. The spacious floor plan is matched by a stylish neutral décor and leafy setting, featuring a tiled kitchen/living area with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, and fresh cream cabinetry, and large lounge/dining with dual aspect windows. Upstairs there are 3 robed bedrooms (main with walk-in robe and ensuite), crisp modern bathroom, and space for a study nook, while a powder room and full size laundry on the ground floor complete the interior. Outside greets with a shaded patio surrounded by leafy mature garden and secure pet/child-friendly fencing. An ideal space for a casual BBQ, the garden also includes tool shed, garage access, and a gate for direct access to the adjoining Brushy Park. Other features include ducted heating, multiple split system air conditioners, floods of natural light, remote double garage, and a quiet neighbourhood. Walk to Croydon North shops, Village school, Croydon North Primary, and bus. With easy access to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Eastland and Eastlink - what are you waiting for?

Description:
Stylish, Spacious And Superbly Positioned
Nestled back from the road for supreme privacy and within close proximity to essential services with shops, schools and cafe culture at your doorstep, this quality appointed abode captures a contemporary look, without losing that homely feel.
Only two years young, light sweeps through this spacious double storey residence, promising a highly functional and comfortable floor plan with every detail having been well planned and executed, from the formal, welcoming lounge through to the open plan, casual living zone showcasing floating floor enriched with deep forest tones and abundant glass that invites the outside in, adding to the overwhelming feeling of spaciousness.
The gourmet kitchen will impress the connoisseur, featuring a stainless steel electric oven, gas stove and dishwasher, stone bench, breakfast bar and ample cupboards - perfectly positioned overlooking the meals and family room which cascades outdoors to a huge decking with tranquil privacy screenings to ensure full enjoyment of the low-maintenance courtyard.
The upper level is zoned for quiet rest and relaxation, featuring split system air-conditioning in each bedroom. The master is also enhanced with a luxury sized his/hers walk-in robe and full ensuite comprising a large shower and stylish vanity, whilst the additional robed bedrooms enjoy convenient access to the sparkling, fully tiled bathroom.
Living convenience is an essential element to this home with highlights including; powder room, well positioned laundry with plenty of cupboard space, gas ducted heating, down lights, high ceilings, stair storage and remote double garage with internal and pedestrian access.
Adorned with a modern facade and complemented by the well established landscaping, this desirable abode is set within walking distance to Croydon North Shopping Plaza, bus stop, Croydon North Primary School and is in close proximity to Oxley College, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and EastLink.
This immaculately presented home is ideal for those who demand first class quality, style and comfort.
Photo ID Required
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
Brand new home, stylish new start
Light-filled living spaces, crisp clean lines and a fresh modern décor are just some of the many features you'll find in this sparkling new brick veneer home offering a low maintenance lifestyle in a quiet yet supremely convenient pocket of Croydon North. Tucked to the back of the block for peace and privacy, this beautifully presented home features a light open-plan kitchen/meals/living zone with quality appliances, stone benchtops, and sleek white cabinetry with soft closing drawers. Further accommodation includes 3 carpeted bedrooms (main with ensuite), fresh modern bathroom, and full-sized laundry. The indoors flows effortlessly out to a paved alfresco area and good-sized rear garden with stylish easy-care landscaping. Additional features include polished Tasmanian Oak floors, split system heating/cooling, fresh inviting colour scheme, 6-star energy rating, and remote double garage. An easy walk to Croydon North shops, with a choice of buses, schools and parklands, plus the Dandenong Ranges and Yarra Valley wine region on your doorstep - this inspiring home truly has it all. Act quickly to secure one of Croydon North's newest and best.

Description:
THE RIGHT BALANCE FOR YOUR FAMILY
We challenge you to find a property in the same category and location that measures up to this exceptional family home. Beautifully cared for, positioned on a corner of a court style streetscape, opposite a park and a few footsteps to local bush land and walking tracks, families are going to love all that this home has to offer.
The gardens are just as well maintained as the inside, featuring established garden beds, a rain water tank system, covered patio and a large remote double garage.
Inside has been partially upgraded, staging a renovated en suite and kitchen, leaving some scope for the new owners to make their own mind up for the main bathroom.
There are three bedrooms with robes, as well as a study or fourth bedroom. Theyre all generous in size making sure that theres plenty of room to accommodate growing children.
Two living areas is a bonus. The lounge is elevated and positioned to take in the rolling hills of the East, and the family/meals zone connects with the kitchen making it a terrific social and casual area of play.
Attention to detail in the kitchen has made this an upgrade to take notice of. Safety, function and usability are all elements that have been perfectly implemented into the space, making it a place of retreat for those who enjoy their cooking.
Reverse style cooling, ducted heating and ducted vacuum add comfort, but its the Tasmanian Oak floors that are hidden under carpet that many will enjoy the unveiling of.
For the men, youre going to get a lot of enjoyment from the space thats under the house. A room to tinker and potter is an added bonus with this property, so too is the inclusion of a workshop or what would make an ideal wine cellar.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Showcasing sophistication and a seamless blend of fine period style detail, this original "Knee homestead", circa 1920's is impressive from beginning to end. Classic features are evident throughout the beautifully presented interior, including lofty 10ft ceilings, ornate ceiling roses and cornices, picture rails, and warm timber floors. An elegant leadlight entrance creates a warm welcome, leading inside to 3 spacious bedrooms (2 with classic open fireplaces), ornate period-style bathroom with pedestal sink and classic tiling, open kitchen/meals zone with freestanding stainless steel cooker, cream country-style cabinetry, timber benchtops, and open fireplace, and good-sized laundry/utility room with WC and storage. The spacious split level lounge/dining room offers an inviting space for relaxation and entertainment, leading to the paved low-maintenance courtyard. Additional features include ducted heating, split system air conditioner, fresh neutral décor, water tank, and double carport with courtyard access. Impossibly close to childcare, primary/secondary schools, McAdam Square shops, bus, train, and Eastlink. Neat as a pin and full of cottage appeal, this property will have you at "hello".

Description:
The Start You've Been Looking For!
This wonderful brick veneer home is nestled in a quiet and tranquil court position on a block of almost a 1/4 of an acre in size making it the perfect start for those buyers that are looking for their 1st home, family home or investment.
Walking up the long driveway you'll find the home that offers you 3 good sized robed bedrooms with the main bedroom providing you with triple robes.
The 2 living areas lead off the formal entry starting with the large lounge room that takes in views over the front garden to then flow through to the dining area that is adjacent to the kitchen.
The timber kitchen is well equipped with plenty of bench and cupboard space plus dishwasher to provide the chef of the family with everything they need to make their kitchen rule for any meal time.
Before we step outside we mustn't forget other internal features such as gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, main bathroom with separate toilet, polished hardwood floors, carpeted bedrooms for comfort plus light filled interiors with bright vibrant colours and tones.
Moving out from the kitchen and dining area you will find the expansive undercover entertaining balcony that takes in full view of the backyard and will be the ideal place to enjoy family gatherings, casual BBQ's, a cool afternoon drink or a leisurely weekend breakfast with a coffee and the paper all whilst being able to keep a close eye on the children and pets playing safely in the yard.
The BIG spacious backyard will be a kids paradise with built in play equipment and cubby house to keep them happy and occupied for hours on end.
The handy person of the family is well looked after with the MASSIVE 4 car garage or MAN CAVE providing ample storage for cars, boats or trailers, plus add in the carport at the front and long driveway for visitor parking.
All this is close to schools, shops, parkland's and walking tracks to make it the ideal start for any buyer.
So be quick and book your viewing today.

Description:
At Last Your Family Can Spread Out in Comfort
CLOSING DATE SALE Tuesday 28th January 5:30pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Your family can spread out and feel right at home in this spacious and modern 2-storey retreat. This 5 bedroom plus study home is set in a beautiful cul-de-sac, with own gate into Yarra Rd Primary. Lush landscaped gardens create a burst of colour from the street, while the freshly painted, light-filled interior is styled with hardwood polished floorboards.
Five bedrooms (robed) plus the option of a study/6th-BR will make life a breeze. A family bathroom and powder room complement these; the master has ensuite and WIR. Three separate living areas and a fully-equipped timber kitchen with a dishwasher will keep everyone happy. A lounge room, large rumpus/media room and vast family/meals room offer you wonderful versatility. The paved entertaining area with a vergola opening roof system, covered pergola and gorgeous landscaped garden set the scene for brilliant outdoor living.
Plus laundry with excellent storage and appointments: remote double garage (rear/undercover access), ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system, fabulous storage and shed. Walk to Yarra Rd Primary, transport and Hochkins Ridge Reserve; close to Luther College, Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar, shops and EastLink. So family-friendly act now!
